Ryan Reynolds Confirms Wife Blake Lively Is Pregnant Again & We Wonder If He Will Be Back With His Funny Parenting Tips
Ryan Reynolds Confirms Wife Blake Lively Is Pregnant Again & We Wonder If He Will Be Back With His Funny Parenting Tips
Deadpool actor Ryan Reynolds is one of the coolest daddy in Hollywood. Ryan and his wife Blake Lively, who are the hottest pair, gave a pleasant surprise to all their fans by announcing they are soon going to be parents for the third time.
Twitter
Blake Lively surprised everyone with her baby bump at the world premiere of Pokémon Detective Pikachu. Take a look.
Twitter
Ryan and Blake walked hand in hand at the premiere but definitely, the onlookers were surprised to see that baby bump. The couple is blessed with two beautiful daughters James and Inez and soon the new addition will join the family.

Twitter
But the question here is - Will Ryan be back with his rib-tickling parenting tips. Who can forget his funny AF parenting tips and we just hope it’s back with the third addition.
Meanwhile, relive Ryan’s funny tweets on parenting.
My infant daughter's traumatized for life. 50 Shades of Grey = Worst fucking coloring book ever. — Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) July 17, 2016
Being a father means responsibility. Not just for your main family, but also the secret one in Denmark nobody knows about. — Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) June 19, 2016
What's better than a 12 hour drive with a screaming 1 year old? Not including hepatitis. — Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) June 2, 2016
I'm writing a children's book in "all caps" so people know to yell. — Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) May 13, 2016
Happy birthday to my baby girl! Sad I lost my virginity. But thankful I have a daughter. — Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) December 16, 2015
My daughter just sneezed into my yawning mouth. Seemed really fucking pleased with herself. Joke's on her. She'll have to bury me someday. — Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) April 16, 2016
After this morning's diaper, my daughter finally earned the teardrop tattoo on her face. — Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) June 14, 2016
On our 6am walk, my daughter asked where the moon goes each morning. I let her know it's in heaven, visiting daddy's freedom. — Ryan Reynolds (@VancityReynolds) October 16, 2016
Coming back to Blake Lively’s third pregnancy, she looked gorgeous AF at the premiere and we just cannot get our eyes off her. We wish her a happy and healthy pregnancy.
